document_data.name: Giant Elk
document_data.mainbody: '''Giant elks''', otherwise known as '''giant stags''', were a rare species of larger than usual [[deer]].
document_data.Description: On average these creatures stood {{SI|7|ft}} tall at the shoulder and weighed around {{SI|1500|lbs|k}}.
document_data.Combat: Giant elks fought other creatures with either their antlers or their sharp forehooves.

Ecology.Habitats:
Like any species of deer, giant elks were typically found in forests with a temperate climate.

In the [[Border Kingdoms]] they could be found in the forest of [[Hawkgarth]].{{Cite polyhedron/124/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: Hawkgarth|6}} In the region of [[Kara-tur]], they could be found in the forests of [[Akari|Akari island]].
Ecology.Relationships: Many cultures considered it taboo to hunt these creatures.

document_data.Rumors & Legends: These creatures were so rare that sightings were interpreted as foreshadowing some important event, like the birth of a future king. Some legends even spoke of [[deities]] manifesting on the [[Prime Material plane]] in the form of giant elks.
